txt.en: Goblin spies can be found near Zarkul-sulûn.\n\nYou should recover notes from goblin spies.
Langhár can found at Zarkul-sulûn.\n\nYou should talk to Langhár.

'Hail, [placeholder]. I have not the time to ask of your adventures since last we met in the Wolf-denes. While I would very much like to hear those stories, they will have to wait.\n\n'We have noticed goblin spies about, lurking in the shadows. The enemy is trying to steal our plans of war. We can not let this happen. Let us find these goblin spies and take back any notes they have collect thus far.'
'Good, you recovered all the notes? Now then, let me see these. There is not much information on these scrawls but there is enough to be useful to the enemy. I have seen enough. Go and burn it.'
A fire pit is located at Zarkul-sulûn.\n\nYou should burn the goblin notes in the fire pit.
The Beorning Langhár is weary of spies encroaching upon Zarkul-sulûn and wishes to defeat them before they learn of the dwarves' war plans.
Burn the goblin notes in the fire pit
